title: # 288 - Keith and The Girl
description:
I sit down in the mancave with Keith Malley and Chemda Khalili from the "Keith and The Girl" Podcast. We talk about Keith quitting drinking, Keith's emergency bathroom story, cultural appropriation, podcasting and much more!

Check out their podcast "Keith and The Girl"

 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
